title: Project-Based Learning Design for Social Innovation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced scientific expertise, foundational project management skills
context.additional_context: A course where current science field professionals with practical experience learn innovative approaches to solving social problems in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze social innovation cases and apply them to project design
Learners can propose actionable innovation plans to solve local community issues using scientific expertise
Learners can document their cognitive changes in a reflective journal during the collaborative problem-solving process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
